## Example

```{r}
 
# today() is a lubridate function which just returns the date as yyyy-mm-dd 
paste0("filename_", today(), ".txt") 
# "filename_2025-06-28.txt" 
 
# wrap in format() to tweak formatting 
format(today(), "%Y%m%d") 
 
# base R Sys.Date() works too.  
format(Sys.Date(), "%Y%m%d")  
 
# or if you wanted a full date-time timestamp 
format(Sys.Date(), "%Y%m%d%H%M%S") 

```
